name: Intrepid Lepid
description:
Build up the confidence to confront your family in this narrative puzzle adventure

Nothing brings more shame to Lepid's relatives than knowing their youngest child lacks a special talent. In a family where everyone is expected to excel at one art or another from their early childhood, Lepid's mediocrity was good enough a reason to keep him isolated in his bedroom and to torment him the rare moments he entered his parents' sight.

Resigned to spend his loveless days on his own, Lepid one day receives a message from his older sister, Libelle, who recently escaped this mad environment and is determined to get him out.

Follow Libelle's instructions throughout the house, solve puzzles and confront your tyrannical relatives to gain enough confidence to step out the front door!

Keep in mind the laws of each room

Each member loves enacting laws on their own territory. Reach the exit door while breaking one law, no more, no less.

Collect Libelle's tapes...

...and learn a bit more about her own journey out to follow her dreams.

Bring an end to an absurd tradition

Excentric relatives will get in your way as you cross their turf. How about you give them a taste of their own medicine since you're there?

Intrepid Lepid's colorful and excentric world was developed as a summer project by four ENJMIN students.
